phase1.name: Quick Wins - Automated Fixes
phase1.approach: Use ESLint auto-fix and TypeScript compiler options

phase2.name: Type Definitions
phase2.approach: Add missing type definitions and interfaces

phase3.name: Module Resolution
phase3.approach: Fix import paths and add missing modules

phase4.name: Complex Refactoring
phase4.approach: Refactor code structure and fix API usage
